mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attachment(attachmentno, postno, upfile, thumb, fname, fsize, rdate, uuid) VALUES(attachment_seq.nextval, #{postno}, #{upfile}, #{thumb}, #{fname}, #{fsize}, sysdate, #{uuid})
mapper.select: SELECT attachmentno, postno, upfile, thumb, fname, fsize, rdate, uuid, visible FROM attachment WHERE postno = #{postno} ORDER BY attachmentno ASC
